Knowledge Blast.name: Knowledge Blast
Knowledge Blast.flavor: You hold up your tome and concentrate all your knowledge through it into a beam of pure energy, firing it at your ignorant foe.
Knowledge Blast.requirement: You must be wielding a tome
Knowledge Blast.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and you push the target 2 squares. The target is dazed and takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Librus Phantasma.name: Librus Phantasma
Librus Phantasma.flavor: You open your tome and your foe flows into the book, where it must navigate through an eldritch labyrinth before returning to reality.
Librus Phantasma.requirement: You must be wielding a tome
Librus Phantasma.onHit: The target is trapped in your tome (save ends). While trapped, the target ceases to exist and can take no actions until it saves. It has line of sight and line of effect to no creature, and no creature has line of sight or line of effect to it. When the target saves, it reappears wherever it was when it was hit by this spell. If that square is occupied, it reappears in the nearest available square of the target’s choice.

Ritual Master.name: Ritual Master
Ritual Master.flavor: Your constant study has revealed the secrets of mysteries that archmages haven’t solved.
Ritual Master.effect: You gain a +10 power bonus to a single ritual skill check.
